diff_hunk:
@@ -507,9 +513,21 @@ def check_file(f):
     extra_compile_args += ['-DWITH_CUDNN']
 
 if WITH_NNPACK:
-    main_libraries += ['nnpack', 'pthreadpool']
-    include_dirs.extend(NNPACK_INCLUDE_DIRS)
-    library_dirs.append(NNPACK_LIB_DIR)
+    if NNPACK_IS_USER_DEFINED:

+        library_dirs.append(NNPACK_LIB_DIR)
+    else:
body: Oh I didn't notice that you copy the files to `tmp_install`! But why? Just add the dir where NNPACK headers are. We don't do this for any other dependency
